Description: Pottery ostracon with remains of 7 lines of text on the recto containing a letter.
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (339-340, pl.52)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82918) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82918)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II Ad 5 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
